sayings.saying: Today is the greatest day I've ever known.
Bork Bork Bork!!
Damn Skippy!
Dinner Gurkins!
Awesome Sauce!!
Toasting my marshmallows
You are a sour grape twerplette!
Eat Dust!
You're a Muffin Stump!
Get Forked!
I'm a wet noodle of sadness :(
I feel like someone went wee in my cornflakes :(
I'm useless like a muffin stump :(
My life is like cherry pits :(
I'm so far behind that I'll never Ketchup :(
Smoking will kill you... Bacon will kill you... But,smoking bacon will cure it.
One day you're the best thing since sliced bread. The next, you're toast.
I removed all the fattening food from my house. It was delicious.
What is an alien's favorite candy? A Mars bar!
What do you call a cow during an earthquake? A milkshake.

compliments: bork you have the shiniest nose hairs!
If you look in the dictionary next to awesome, you'll find a picture of bork!
bork, did it hurt when you fell out of heaven?
bork, I'd hug you if I weren't just pixels!
bork, I bet you sweat glitter!
